artist: Artist: Gustave Baumann; Printer: Gustave Baumann; Publisher: Swanli Press (studio of Gustave Baumann)
description: landscape with two trees at left with white blossoms; trees in middle ground at right; green plants in foreground; brown fields in middle ground; green hills in background; green-grey sky; received mounted to foamcore board
markings:
Numbered lower margin, in pencil: no 41/100 

Artist\'s chopmark, LRC between first and last names in signature, stamped in brown: [swan symbol], for Swanli Press studio
provenance: Private Collection, Bloomington, Indiana (by descent; has remained in family of original purchaser); [Eckert & Ross, Indianapolis, Ind., until 2017; sold to Kinney]; Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-19); given to MIA, 2019.
title: Spring Day
